existing_features.title: Add new authenticated routes for a Stats page and a Settings page, and ensure route content renders correctly within the app layout.
Add a persistent in-app navigation menu (tabs or header nav) for signed-in users to access: My Goals (/), New Goal (/create), Stats (/stats), and Settings (/settings).
Implement the Stats page UI to display basic goal analytics computed from the existing goals list (no new backend APIs).
Implement the Settings page UI to allow the signed-in user to view and update their profile name using existing profile APIs, with proper loading/saving states.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a Stats page to the app
Add a Settings (Param√®tres) page to the app
Add a menu/tab navigation to access pages (Home/My Goals, Add Goal, Stats, Settings)

projectName: Add Stats and Settings pages with top navigation
